What is the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace, and how does it work?

The Verus ID and NFT Marketplace is a decentralized platform where users can buy and sell VerusIDs and NFTs (non-fungible tokens) directly on the blockchain. It allows users to advertise their offers to the owner of an ID or NFT, or post the sale of their NFT on the blockchain for everyone to see. Transactions are executed in a completely decentralized way, without the need for intermediaries. Users can pay or offer to pay from transparent or zero-knowledge private addresses, and accept payment to either type of address as well.

### Verus ID and NFT Marketplace
Buy and sell VerusIDs on-chain, advertising your offer directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or posting the sale of your NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all the world to see. Execute transactions in a completely decentralized way. Pay or offer to pay from a transparent or zero-knowledge private address, still auditable by you. Accept payment to either as well, and best of all, execute your transactions directly, peer-to-peer without any intermediary necessary. Don’t worry the on-chain model still makes room for owners to select and share proceeds with value added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in a new economy of provable digital ownership. It’s the next step in the evolution of VerusID, the most powerful self-sovereign identity and secure storage model for funds in the digital world.### Verus Vault
With Verus Vault you can now protect funds on a VerusID, even from theft of a private key! If you lock your VerusID with Vault you cannot spend funds from that identity at all until it is again unlocked. While locked, you can still stake those same funds on the Verus network and earn by doing so. Of course, you can also still receive funds.IT IS IMPORTANT TO NOTE THAT ENABLING REVOCATION, RECOVERY, AND ALL VERUS VAULT CAPABILITIES REQUIRE YOU TO HAVE ONE PRIMARY IDENTITY, AND AT LEAST ONE REVOCATION/RECOVERY ID CONFIGURED.
./raw_text_input_wiki/release_notes.md
What benefits does the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace offer to users?

The Verus ID and NFT Marketplace offers several benefits to users, including:

* Decentralized and peer-to-peer transactions, without the need for intermediaries
* Ability to advertise offers directly to the owner of an ID or NFT
* Ability to post the sale of an NFT on the blockchain for everyone to see
* Transparency and auditability of transactions
* Ability to pay or offer to pay from transparent or zero-knowledge private addresses
* Ability to accept payment to either type of address
* Room for owners to select and share proceeds with value-added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in the digital ownership economy

What is Verus Vault, and how does it work?

Verus Vault is a feature that allows users to protect funds on a VerusID, even in the event of private key theft. When a VerusID is locked with Vault, the user cannot spend funds from that identity until it is unlocked again. However, the user can still stake those funds on the Verus network and earn rewards. The user can also still receive funds while the identity is locked.

What are the requirements for enabling revocation, recovery, and Verus Vault capabilities?
To enable revocation, recovery, and Verus Vault capabilities, users must have at least one primary identity and at least one revocation/recovery ID configured.
